about_the_game:
Welcome to MojiCraft!

Build up your army of Mojis and lead them into tactical battles! MojiCraft is a turn-based real-time strategy game with a minimalistic playstyle. Perfect for players who enjoy tactical games without a steep learning curve. Play casually with friends or show off your mastery by crafting unstoppable strategies. 

Choose Your Faction

There are a variety of factions, each with its own unique playstyle. Whether you're playing as the adaptable Humans, the fierce Beasts, or the sneaky Critters, there's a faction for everyone. Each one brings something different to the table, and figuring out how to make the most of your chosen faction is part of the fun!

Lead Your Army To Victory

Adaptability and tactical precision are key to victory. Start off by commanding one Moji from your faction and build up your structures and resources to produce even more Mojis. Fend off enemy attacks and send Mojis into battles of attrition or go all-in! Adjust your tactics to destroy all the structures of your enemies and claim victory.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 4096 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

short_description: MojiCraft is a minimal turn-based real-time strategy game where you build an army of Mojis and lead them into tactical battles. Choose from multiple unique factions, manage your resources, and claim victory by outsmarting your opponents and adapting your strategy to destroy their territory.
